The Facebook post featuring the photo of: Iweala as the new WTO Director-General.
The confirmation from the photographer: Allen Coleman, who stated that the photo was part of a series called 'EYES' and was taken between 2013 and 2015. He also explicitly denied that the photo was of Okonjo-Iweala.
The analysis of the image using the open: source tool InVID WeVerify, which revealed that the photo was taken on July 28, 2014, and edited a few days later, further supporting Coleman's claim.
The fact that Okonjo: Iweala was born in 1954, making her 60 years old in 2014, which contradicts the claim that the photo shows her as a young girl.
